definition: meticulous/(of domestic animals or fowls) young

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
Wan Chai district of Hong Kong
to give birth (animals)/to bear a litter
type of opera from Taiwan and Fujian

sentences.english: If you go to Aberdeen on Hong Kong Island, you will see Ocean Park.
sentences.chinese: 如果你到港岛香港仔，你会看到海洋公园。

sentences.english: They say she plays guitar and cries and sings.
sentences.chinese: 大家都话她识弹结他，又识鬼咁叫同唱歌仔。

sentences.english: Then they found a young fish who was known for playing hooky from school.
sentences.chinese: 于是他们找了条以逃学出名的小鱼仔。

sentences.english: A large amount of research has been devoted to the study of lipid nutrition in marine fish larvae during the recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来国外海水仔稚鱼脂类营养研究取得了重要进展。

sentences.english: Blade please chicken rice seed seeking from waterway escorted out of the city of hu pictureque method.
sentences.chinese: 刀锋拜托鸡饭仔寻求从水路护送胡畔出城之法。

sentences.english: Chicken rice seed into unconsciousness, at the last gasp.
sentences.chinese: 鸡饭仔人事不省，奄奄一息。

sentences.english: By the pool in the resort, the Little Mermaid and her friends.
sentences.chinese: 酒店泳池边，见到美人鱼同距既朋友仔。

sentences.english: LEGO Minifig alarm clocks shaped like Star Wars characters.
sentences.chinese: 乐高按照星球大战人物造型制作的人仔闹钟。

sentences.english: They've already done this with a couple of folks at Aberdeen.
sentences.chinese: 他们已经这样做了几个人在香港仔。

sentences.english: So is this Sunday, let me become a four eyes.
sentences.chinese: 所以就在这个星期天，让我变成了四眼仔。

sentences.english: Sibling two people have resorted to take refuge in tears fiance peng shrimp monsters.
sentences.chinese: 兄妹二人只得去投靠秋菊的未婚夫彭虾仔。

sentences.english: And the number of species and mean density showed seasonal tendencies.
sentences.chinese: 该水域仔稚鱼的种类和平均密度具有季节性变化趋势。

sentences.english: Her hair is yellow. Do you have any dogs?
sentences.chinese: 她的毛是黄色的。恁兜敢有狗仔？

sentences.english: That is the sole consideration which can make him endure the whelp .
sentences.chinese: 就是这唯一的动机才使他能容忍这个小狗仔。

sentences.english: Those skinheads are always hanging around together in the street.
sentences.chinese: 那些光头仔总是一起在街上闲荡。

sentences.english: NEVAN:Welcome, sir. Is this your first time here?
sentences.chinese: 欢迎啊，少年仔。第一次来这里吗？

definition: bamboo fish trap/used in names of places connected with Shantou 汕頭|汕头[Shan4 tou2]
brisket/belly beef/spongy meat from cow's underside and neighboring ribs/see 牛腩[niu2 nan3] esp. Cantonese/erroneously translated as sirloin
